scripts.db:migrate: pgrep -x Cursor && echo '❌ Error: Cursor is running. Please close Cursor before running migrations.' && exit 1 || pnpm run db < extension/jarvis4-worldview-updater/migrations/v1-single-table.sql && echo '✅ Migration complete'
scripts.db:highlights: pnpm run db "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM highlights;"
scripts.recent-changes:link: ln -sf "$HOME/code/jarvis4/scripts/recent-changes.js" "$HOME/notes/Neighborhood Notes/.git/hooks/pre-commit" && echo '✅ Git hook symlinked!'
